com.vmware.esx.settings.hosts.software

Interface Drafts

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, DraftsTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DraftsStub

    public interface Drafts
extends Service, DraftsTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Drafts interface provides methods to manage working copy of software documents. This interface was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        Drafts.CommitInvocation commit(java.lang.String host,
                               java.lang.String draft,
                               DraftsTypes.CommitSpec spec)
        Commits the specified draft as the desired state document. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} where the task-id is the response of this operation. It will also validate the document before committing it. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the commit. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.commit.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - If there is another operation in progress.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host or if there is no draft associated with draft in the system.
        InvalidArgument - If validation of the software document fails. The value of the data property of Error will be a class that contains all the properties defined in DraftsTypes.ValidateResult.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        draft - Identifier of the draft. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        spec - The spec to be used to create the commit.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.CommitInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described commit operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • create

        Drafts.CreateInvocation create(java.lang.String host)
        Creates a new software draft from the desired document. It will be deleted, when the draft is committed successfully. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the working copy of the document. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.

        Operation Errors:
        AlreadyExists - If there is already a draft created by this user.
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:

        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.CreateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described create operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • delete

        Drafts.DeleteInvocation delete(java.lang.String host,
                               java.lang.String draft)
        Deletes the software draft. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:

        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        draft - Identifier of the draft. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.DeleteInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described delete operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • get

        Drafts.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String host,
                         java.lang.String draft)
        Returns the information about given software draft. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Information about the Software Draft.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:

        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy of the document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • list

        Drafts.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String host)
        Returns information about the software drafts for the specified host that match the DraftsTypes.FilterSpec. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Map of software drafts keyed by their identifiers. The key in the return value Map will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:

        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • validate

        Drafts.ValidateInvocation validate(java.lang.String host,
                                   java.lang.String draft)
        Validates the software draft. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} where the task-id is the response of this operation. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Result of validation.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy of the document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ValidateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described validate operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • scan

        Drafts.ScanInvocation scan(java.lang.String host,
                           java.lang.String draft)
        Scans the host against the software draft. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} where the task-id is the response of this operation. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Result of scan operation.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy of the document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ScanInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described scan operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • importSoftwareSpec

        Drafts.ImportSoftwareSpecInvocation importSoftwareSpec(java.lang.String host,
                                                       DraftsTypes.ImportSpec spec)
        Imports the desired software specification. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the working copy of the document. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no host associated with host in the system or if the source type of import specification is of either LATEST_RECOMMENDATION or CURRENT_SERIES_RECOMMENDATION, and a recommendation does not exist for the host. It was either never generated or deleted due to changes in host state such as a new desired image spec being committed.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unsupported - If the host is not a vLCM managed standlone host.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:

        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        spec - Specification to import desired software specification.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ImportSoftwareSpecInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described importSoftwareSpec operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
